OOC: there are three bots inside of Astroblast, the rule says no 
more than three bots btw. 
 ---RYO D, i'm a little confused as to what's going on here, it looks 
like Koj is jumping from the Ark (or LA2?) at Astroblast. And Liono 
is gunning down both Astroblast, and Koj? 
 ---Is the LA2 the ship you took to get your chars to the ark?   
 ---The LA2 is trying to ram Astroblast's thrusters, with a claw or 
what? And he's shooting at Astroblast as well. 
 ---NOTE: Wouldn't that hit Koj as well? 
 ---Could you supply a better description of your chars, I couldn't 
figure out just quite what your chars were from your description on 
the characters page on the nbwrpg main site.
 ---Just curious... and confused... and wanting to know what's going 
on before making any serious commitments.



On 31 Jan 2001, at 18:11, RYO D wrote:

> ((Note Koj is a Ninja built to fight in all environments he adjust even to 
> the endless space also how many fighters are in the ship I mean isn't there 
> a transport rule.))
> 
> ::Koj::
> "Well at least we know there not coming for a guided tour" Finishes setting 
> up a trap.
> 
> ::Liono::
> Liono eyes narrow  "Lets get Dangerous." As he sets the shields to Layer 
> each other using the stolen generators.
> 
> ::Koj::
> "Can't be a hero hiding underneath my bed" as he puts in the CD Lilly gave 
> him  "I'll slow them down"  Gets in the Air Lock "Tenko Battle mode adjust" 
> The Cracks in Koj's armor seals off all cracks as his mane pulls into his 
> helmet his optics adjust as his thruster come online as he activates his 
> energy weapons. Koj opens the Air Lock and enters the space.
> 
> ::Dark::
> "Ok Liono the main cannon needs time to charge!" Dark inside the Lion 
> Assault 2 releases the docking Clips. "Koj get on."
> 
> ::Koj::
> Koj gets on top the LA2 splits the Fang into 2 halves and ties chains to 
> each end of the Fang as he links the to his shoulders.
> 
> ::Liono Assault 2::
> The LA 2 released swings around wide enters all range mode locks on course 
> as the Fins extend it fires off flying at max speed towards the enemy ship 
> trying to ram there main Thrusters as the LA2 Claw swing forward trying to 
> rip off a secondary thrusters or grab the ship. What it looks like best pic 
> I could find showing Koj on top a section of the ship.
> 
> http://www.geocities.com/Hollywood/Picture/5627/Teknoman03.jpg
> 
> ::Koj::
> Koj scans the Enemy ship takes the fangs and jumps off the LA2. Thrusting 
> them trying to stab it into the main and secondary engines.
> 
> ::Liono::
> Liono releases the space mines and starts firing the autoguns stage 1 at the 
> enemy ship. As he read the main cannons print out he starts to layer the 
> shields. "Bring it on." Liono notices the scan is finished and sends the 
> collected data to cats lair then deletes the Location of Cats Layer.
>
